text: Hello Pluto people, I just saw this tweet from the Jupyter community and thought it might be a cool inspiration for you: <https://twitter.com/CarlosHerreroB/status/1380548715283410954> . Tbh it would probably be much cooler / practical in Pluto :slightly_smiling_face:

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/CarlosHerreroB|@CarlosHerreroB>: Voila-Gridstack 0.2 is out!
New improvements on the interface make it easier to create dashboards from #JupyterNotebooks.

<https://github.com/voila-dashboards/voila-gridstack> <https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1380544743751442432/pu/img/pZtSemG45uHKA8dg.jpg>
attachments.text:

text: There was a really cool talk about this exact feature at PlutoCon yesterday. I played around with it last night and it seems pretty close to being there.

elements.text: Hello Pluto people, I just saw this tweet from the Jupyter community and thought it might be a cool inspiration for you:
. Tbh it would probably be much cooler / practical in Pluto
There was a really cool talk about this exact feature at PlutoCon yesterday. I played around with it last night and it seems pretty close to being there.
